app.name: KYC-AML Agentic AI Orchestrator
app.tagline: Intelligent Document Processing with 5 Specialized Agents

banner.title: ü§ñ KYC-AML Agentic AI Orchestrator
banner.subtitle: Intelligent Document Processing Powered by CrewAI
banner.description: Process, classify, and extract data from KYC/AML documents using AI agents

items.title: Process Documents
items.description: Upload or point to documents - I'll classify and extract data automatically

items.title: Classify Documents
items.description: PAN cards, Aadhaar, passports, licenses, utility bills, bank statements & more

items.title: Extract Information
items.description: Names, addresses, dates, ID numbers - structured data from any document

items.title: Manage Cases
items.description: Create cases, link documents, track KYC verification status

items.title: Link & Organize
items.description: Documents can belong to multiple cases - flexible many-to-many linking

items.title: Generate Summaries
items.description: AI-powered case summaries with discrepancy detection

items.name: QueueAgent
items.description: Scans paths, expands folders, splits multi-page PDFs

items.name: ClassificationAgent
items.description: Identifies document types via REST API with confidence scores

items.name: ExtractionAgent
items.description: Extracts structured data (names, IDs, addresses) via REST API

items.name: MetadataAgent
items.description: Tracks processing status, handles errors and retries

items.name: SummaryAgent
items.description: Generates processing reports and case summaries

footer.tip: Just ask naturally - I understand plain English!
